meaningMnemonic: What do we call the <kanji>sun</kanji>'s <kanji>exit</kanji> from the horizon? That'll be the <vocabulary>sunrise</vocabulary>. Imagine the sun exiting the horizon and climbing up into the sky.
readingMnemonic: This uses the kanji's kun'yomi readings, which you've already learned. As long as you remember those, you should be good to go!
